authlogic.error.password_not_hashed: Internal error: Password was not properly hashed before authentication.
authlogic.error.server_signature_invalid: Could not verify the server's identity. The server's signature is invalid.
authlogic.error.server_key_mismatch: The server's identity key has changed since you last connected!
authlogic.error.server_key_mismatch.deta:
This could mean:
• The server was reinstalled or changed ownership
• Someone is attempting to intercept your connection (MITM attack)

If you trust this change, delete the server's key from your AuthLogic config.
authlogic.error.mojang_certificate_missi: Online mode authentication requires a valid Minecraft account.
Make sure you are logged into a legitimate Minecraft account.
authlogic.error.mojang_certificate_expir: Your Mojang player certificate has expired.
Please restart the game to refresh your certificate.
authlogic.error.verification_type_not_re: The server requested an unknown authentication method: %s
authlogic.error.internal_client: An internal error occurred during authentication. Please try again.
authlogic.screen.setup_password.title: Setup AuthLogic Password
authlogic.screen.setup_password.descript: This password will be used to generate a unique key per server.
authlogic.screen.setup_password.warning: Warning: You cannot restore this password later!
authlogic.screen.setup_password.error.to: Password must be at least 4 characters.
